name: ENEBOX
description:
A Game where you have to shoot the enemy or jump to avoid it!

 Use (W) to jump and (S) to shoot! 

This is my first game published here So Please Enjoy!

Fight Enemies, Collect Health, Buy Guns, Power-Ups and Get a High-score

Enemies Walker - Doesn't do anything
Shooter - Shoot bullets at you
Sploder - Explode when near you
Flyer - Fly and shoots bullet at you (annoyingly)
Gargant - Big and strong (will push you off the ledge)
Boss - Spawns enemy (will add special attack to boss soon)

Please tell me if there's any bugs or what should I add to improve the game!!

this game is originally made for mobile but i haven't publish it to play store yet :(
